Explosions rock Libya as NATO forces continue the assault on Gadhafi's forces.
Yemeni security forces kill nine and wound dozens as protests against President Ali Abdullah Saleh continue.
The strongest earthquake in 57 years kills at least ten in southern Spain.
Funerals continue throughout Syria as government forces shell residential areas.
Record flooding continues along the Mississippi River in the US as floodwaters move south.
Ugandan opposition leader, Kizza Besigye, returns ahead of President Yoweri Museveni's swearing in.
